>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_spendable_coin_count","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with coin count","required":["count"],"properties":{"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Number of spendable coins","minimum":0}},"title":"GetSpendableCoinCountResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
